DSE- For more information please go to https://do-something-everyday.herokuapp.com
Commands-
HELP-
	If the word help is used in any message sent to DSE, this message will be sent.
DELETE-
	If DSE receives the message 'DELETE <options>', then DSE will confirm your intention and delete that data from its database.
Legal options are
	USER, ME, or ALL- Any of these will delete the user's entire database record
	NAME- This will delete the user's preferred name and ask for a new one
	 GOAL <name>- This will delete the goal with the name <name> from the user's list of goals
	 HOBBY <name>- This will delete the hobby with the name <name> from the user's list of hobbies
	 SUPPORTER or SUPPORT <name>- This will delete the supporter with the name <name> from the user's list of supporters
Hi, thank you for trying out Do Something Everyday.  This bot is here to provide personal reminders to help you track if you do something everyday.
I am very literal so please be brief when answering my questions.  With that in mind, what should I call you?
You got it /NAME/.  I've memorized that now. Any information you send to me stored. Thomas encrypted any data I get so he wont accidentally see it and he promises it will stay that way.
So, what have you been working on lately?
Do you have other goals to work towards doing daily?
What else are you working on?
What is something that consistently relaxes you?
Is there anything else that helps comfort you to do?
Do you have anyone who can check in on you if you're not doing well?
Well maybe that's something we can work on.  Would you like to add making connections as a goal?
Great, I'll add making connections to our list of your goals
Is there anyone else you can get support from when you need it?
Thank you, that's all I need.  Let's get started!
